rows.translation: I do call to witness this City;-

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.

rows.translation: And thou art a freeman of this City;-
And (the mystic ties of) parent and child;-
Verily We have created man into toil and struggle.

rows.arabic: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
rows.translation: Thinketh he, that none hath power over him?
He may say (boastfully); Wealth have I squandered in abundance!
Thinketh he that none beholdeth him?
Have We not made for him a pair of eyes?-
And a tongue, and a pair of lips?-
And shown him the two highways?
But he hath made no haste on the path that is steep.
And what will explain to thee the path that is steep?-
(It is:) freeing the bondman;

rows.arabic: أَوْ إِطْعَـٰمٌ فِى يَوْمٍ ذِى مَسْغَبَةٍ
rows.translation: Or the giving of food in a day of privation
rows.transliteration: aw iṭ`āmun fī yawmin dhī masghabah

rows.translation: To the orphan with claims of relationship,
Or to the indigent (down) in the dust.

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلْمَرْحَمَةِ
rows.translation: Then will he be of those who believe, and enjoin patience, (constancy, and self-restraint), and enjoin deeds of kindness and compassion.
rows.transliteration: thumma kāna minal ladhīna āmanū watawāṣaw biṣ ṣabri watawāṣaw bil marḥamah

rows.translation: Such are the Companions of the Right Hand.

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْمَشْـَٔمَةِ
rows.translation: But those who reject Our Signs, they are the (unhappy) Companions of the Left Hand.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna kafarū bi-āyātinā hum aṣ-ḥābul mash-amah

rows.translation: On them will be Fire vaulted over (all round).
